LanguageSettings.name: LanguageSettings
LanguageSettings.label: Language Settings
LanguageSettings.description: Represents LanguageSettings metadata component used in Salesforce deployments and package development.

FullName.description: The unique identifier for this metadata component

enableCanadaIcuFormat.description: enable Canada Icu Format field of LanguageSettings metadata component.

enableEndUserLanguages.description: enable End User Languages field of LanguageSettings metadata component.

enableICULocaleDateFormat.description: enable I C U Locale Date Format field of LanguageSettings metadata component.

enablePlatformLanguages.description: enable Platform Languages field of LanguageSettings metadata component.

enableTranslationWorkbench.description: enable Translation Workbench field of LanguageSettings metadata component.

useLanguageFallback.description: use Language Fallback field of LanguageSettings metadata component.
